General.Name: Mene Inc
General.Description: Mene Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets 24 karat gold and platinum jewelry in the United States, Canada, Europe, and internationally. It offers charms, chains, bands, earrings, pendants, rings, bracelets, precious objects, and medallions under the Mene brand. The company retails its jewelry products directly to consumer through its mene.com website. Mene Inc. is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 334 Adelaide Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5V 1R4
